programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raphs strength wont save him when hes caught between the Mechazoids and the notorious street gang known as Purple Dragons! Hell have to use his head on this one! ) 09:00 Rock, Paper, Scissors Rock, Paper and Scissors are three best friends who share an apartment together and compete over everything. Week to week, they have tiny problems that always get out of hand. (Subtitled) 09:15 Rock, Paper, Scissors Rock, Paper and Scissors are three best friends who share an apartment together and compete over everything. Week to week, they have tiny problems that always get out of hand. (Subtitled)

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Cosmo and Wanda grant a wish to make Hazels potato project work for the Science Fair, they rewrite the rules of science for the whole universe! When the physical world goes haywire as a result, they cant undo it because not even their magic is not working correctly! And Sci, the Science Fairy, refuses to help Hazel because he does not approve of her shortcut. Hazel must learn the real science behind her potato project to power up Cosmo and Wandas wands and set the universe right again. // After watching a detective TV show with her dad, Hazel wishes she could solve a mystery like a genuine gumshoe. At first, she is wrapped up in the thrill of solving a mystery, but things get real when the landlord goes missing. Everyone is a suspect - kids at school, the strange new neighbors, and even Cosmo and Wanda! Things intensify when Hazel suspects her family is the next target. In a dramatic climax at dinner at her neighbors, Hazel unveils the truth. Is it foul play? Or is it just her imagination?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Winn, and Jasmine go to Patty Possums Party Playground, an entertainment fun zone for kids. Hazel wishes the animatronic Patty Possum would come to life. Patty joins the friends for the night and even brings them up to perform on stage! But at closing time, Patty doesnt want to lose her new friends, so she locks them inside the Party Playground. Cosmo and Wandas wands are stuck in the claw machine, so they cant help! They will have to evade this unhinged mascot without magic and find a way out.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Lily introduces Jack to her favorite video game, but when he keeps losing, Jack binges the game and turns into a toxic troll. // Slice of life vignettes that illustrate the modern-day family dynamic.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Min asks Jack to run a simple errand, but Charlie the gibbon intervenes, sending Jack and Lil chasing after him into the towns abandoned mines.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick and Squidina help the Flim-Flam brothers hunt the ghost that haunts their house. Once they discover that ghost is actually GrandPat exacting his revenge on the brothers, the group struggles to get GrandPats ghost back into his dead (sleeping) body. // On her day off from the Patrick Show, Squidina helps Rube produce his TV show. Meanwhile, GrandPat convinces the jealous Patrick to sabotage their production, but each of his attempts backfire worse than the last.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Will and Min show Jack around to help him find a good story. Lily spills boba in Jacks suitcase and tries to hide the evidence. Jack tries to find "the big picture" as Lily shows him how to spend a perfect summer day in Canyon Valley.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

Chloe, Jinx, and Booch create a costume they are excited about, leaving it at the beach house until the they can present it at school. Meanwhile, Phoebe learns that Max has gotten them jobs at the school, but while he has a cushy Vice Principal job, she is the new Art teacher. Their argument over this leads to accidentally destroying it the new mascot costume. After Chloe discovers what theyve done and is furious with them, Max and Phoebe realize that being her guardian comes with more responsibility than they imagined.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazels feelings are hurt when her friends decide to go to the school dance instead of her book club. She storms off, but then realizes she wants to go to the dance too. Hazel wishes for Kennueth, a half-fish, half-man character from her favorite manga, to come out of his story and take her to the dance. Hazel must get through the dance before Kennueths true form, and magic, are revealed. // Hazel learns about the harmful effects of trash and pollution on Earth, so she wishes that people wouldnt be such trash monsters. Cosmo and Wanda summon a friendly, talking, trash eating dumpster named Danky! Together they spread the word about sustainability and caring for the earth. Then, Dale Dimmadome tricks Danky into helping him sell more products, making people even bigger trash monsters! Hazel must get Danky back and stop Dale Dimmadome in his wasteful tracks.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Wanting Angela and Marcus to have a romantic anniversary, Hazel wishes that they would "fall in love all over again." When the wish causes her parents to forget each other, Hazel calls on Cupid to make them fall back in love. Upset that Hazel undid his work, Cupid challenges her to a competition in which Hazel and Marcus must compete with Cupid and Angelas old flame, Brewster, for Angelas affection. Can she beat Cupid at his own game and get her parents to fall back in love?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

Phoebe discovers that she and Captain Perfect have many of the same interests, and make a good crime-fighting team. As Phoebe wonders if she might have a new partner, Captain Perfect privately lets a contact know that he has earned Phoebes trust and is ready for the next phase of his assignment.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: During a visit from Antony, Hazels wish lands them inside "Rattleconda Racers," a board game they invented. Once in the game, however, they bicker about the best way to play. Hazel wants to stick to the rules they used to play by, but Antony wants to make new ones. When the formidable Rhonda the Rattleconda takes off with Cosmo and Wanda, intending to make them her next meal, Hazel and Antony must confront the tension in their relationship to save them and escape the game! // When Hazel must give a presentation on what she wants to be when she grows up, she is excited to share her dreams of being a geologist! Wanting to wow her classmates, she wishes she could excavate an "out of this world" rock to show them. Cosmo and Wanda poof her underground to find a super special rock, and she does! But in the process, she angers a group of rock monsters and must use her knowledge of geology to win them over, get her rock back, and escape the cave!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Dev is bummed at his own birthday party because his dad is off working. Hazel tries to cheer him up by wishing for a pair of rocket boots for him. He is stoked! Then, a party princess arrives, but this is no ordinary party princess, its VICKY from the original series. Meanwhile, Cosmo, Wanda, and Peri stumble into a secret room, where they discover that Dale has been investigating Hazel since Founders Day. Back at the party, Vicky, rotten as ever, forces the kids to make crafts for her online store instead of having fun. Hazel comes up with a plan full of zany traps to stop Vicky and take the party back! When Dev discovers his dad has been researching Hazel instead of spending time with him, Dev lashes out at Hazel and wishes Peri away. Left alone with his anger, is there a devious plan hatching in Devs mind?

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Lils favorite boba shop is closing! The kids try to save the cafe using pucker limes, but are quickly forced to save Canyon Valley from the pucker. // Lil and Min both realize how similar they are to their moms and set out to distinguish themselves.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jacks new friend Beef invites him to a sleepover. Jack, a sleepover newb, freaks out over impressing his new friend. // Jack and Lil try to prove theyre the one true local, enduring a series of bizarre quests in the local dive restaurant Dead Eds.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth. // Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe are determined to prove they can be good guardians, and use a disguise gadget to transform into their parents to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up, and must transform into Max and Phoebe to keep the ruse going.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: On a fairy family trip to Fairy World, Dev convinces Hazel to steal Peris wand and explore Fairy World. Cosmo, Wanda and Peri sneak into Jorgens office and use his tracker to find them. Hazel and Dev end up stuck in the Un-Wish Zone, trapped by the Un-wish Dragon. Together they must battle the dragon and find their way back to their fairies before Jorgen finds out!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max decides to surprise Phoebe on one of her solo missions, only to discover that she has been secretly teaming up with Captain Perfect. When Max hears Captain Perfect discuss his plans for the Thundermans with someone else, he realizes that the mystery supe is keeping a secret from them. After confronting Captain Perfect, the Thundermans are told by him and President Kickbutt that the new supe was sent to Secret Shores to spy on the twins, and to decide whether they should be allowed to stay on their mission. Meanwhile, Chloes crush invites her to his fathers product launch party at Splat By The Sea, at the same time Jinx and Booch want Chloe to protest the wealthy family outside the party. Unable to hurt anyones feelings, Chloe tries to use her powers to be in two places at once.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel and Jasmine have planned their very first sleepover but Dev Dimmadome threatens to throw an even better party! To draw her classmates attention Hazel boasts that she lives in a luxury hotel and wishes her apartment building into The Wellsington Hotelsington Hotel. Now she must balance running the hottest hotel in Dimmadelphia and spending time with Jasmine and Winn before they check out of the friendship! // Hoping to win a class superlative, Hazel wishes to be famous at her school. Father Time cuts her a deal for 1,500 minutes of fame, but Principal Krentz is not happy about Hazels celebrity status and threatens to transfer her if she doesnt stop being a "distraction" by the end of lunch. With tons of time left on her wish, Nick of Time arrives with a solution: if Hazel acts like a New Yorker, her remaining minutes will turn into New York Minutes and pass faster. Can Hazel act New Yorky enough to beat the clock?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth. // Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Littlefoot: Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster! Kowalski comes to the rescue with his invention the Persona-Disentangleizer, which separates her savage nature from her regular self. The savage Marlene escapes and rampages through the city. Can the Penguins stop her before she destroys the city? Smotherly Love: Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home during a battle with Hans the Puffin. She smothers the penguins with love and nurturing, and gets her new boys to behave by playing possum whenever necessary. The battle-hardened unit devolves into a bunch of softies, opening the door for Hans to take advantage. It looks like he has the upper wing, unless someone can make a play to stop him!

programme.desc: Best wins a competition to pitch his story ideas to world famous author A N Other, and finds that threes a crowd. // Best and Bester housesit for Diamondo and realise that theres more to it than massage chairs and unlimited snacks.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Not your average bunch of teenagers, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have been expertly trained by their anthropomorphic rat sensei, Splinter, in the art of ninjutsu. Criminals of New York beware, beneath the streets of this concrete metropolis, Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael are waiting to put their training into practice, battling evil forces within the city and restoring peace. From petty thieves, to evil overlords, to aliens of an unfamiliar kind, New York is safe in the hands of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig
programme.desc: This animated comedy show follows the outrageous and often gross-out antics of a enthusiastic and curious 12-year-old boy named Sanjay Patel and his best friend and a master of disguise, a talking snake named Craig. They complete each other and together they are ready to face any challenges and difficulties that life has ahead for them.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Commissioner flips his lid, literally. His toupee blows off and sticks to Maurice, who also gets red cheeks and a skinned tail, all by accident. Julien and Mort chase him with sticks, intent on beating the "monster" stuck to Maurices head. The baboon ladies take Maurice in, protecting and pampering him because they mistakenly think hes a male baboon. Its up to the penguins to get the toupee back and restore it to its rightful scalp. // Shelly the ostrich gets stuck in drying cement and only Rico can save her. Shelly falls for him hard as a result, however, Ricos heart forever belongs to his doll. Shelly swipes the doll and tries hard to win his heart, but Rico doesnt budge and his doll is accidently hauled off in a recycle truck. The penguins give chase but are left hopelessly in the dust. Shelly, wanting to make amends, tosses them on her back and sprints after the truck - can she possibly catch it?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: "HALF-HOUR SUMMER VACATION SPECIAL The penguins worst nightmare has come true. After a sailing trip gone wrong they wind up in the Hoboken Zoo. Strangely, the animals are happy, the zoo is a paradise, and life couldnt be better! Zookeeper Frances takes outstanding care of all of them or does she? Something sinister bubbles under the surface the happy animals are actually androids, and the real animals are held captive in a dungeon. Theyre too messy and Zookeeper Frances cant stand a mess! A rescue comes from a very unlikely source, and the final battle could go either way!"

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and ""geeks out"" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: While traveling towards the North Pole, the group almost gets captured by the Fire Nation. However, when a charismatic young man and his band of rebels attack the Fire Nations camp and rescue them, the gang learns that the rebels are trying to resist the Fire Nations motives to expand their territory. Katara and Aang really enjoy their time with the band of rebels, but Sokka soon discovers that they arent as noble as meets the eye

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: The twins take a cactus called Pricklebutt to the beach and end up mounting a dramatic search and rescue mission. // Best and Bester wont let Grumpy Pants round of golf stop them from catching the finale of their favourite show.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Its Best to the rescue when Besters phobia of camels threatens to de-rail her chances of being dance champ. // Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition and what happens when burgers and banjos collide?

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bester finds that the only way to get her brothers attention when hes glued to the game, is to be in the game. // Best and Bester stage a crazy publicity stunt for Grafifis repair shop which has everyone fearing for their lives.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale
programme.desc: The hamsters are convinced that Harrys royal-themed birthday party is a front for a full-on Hamsterdale invasion. // When Lil Pals favorite toy falls into the A/C vent, Mondo embarks on a journey to retrieve it.

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: It is pure luck to have a genie to fulfill all wishes, to have two of them is something incredible. Leah is a little girl with a genie bottle necklace, which includes Shimmer and Shine, genie twins. Shimmer is a genie with blue eyes and pink hair, encouraging and passionate, she has a pet, a gibbon monkey Tala. Shine is her twin genie with purple eyes and blue hair, big animal lover. Her pet is a little Bengal tiger Nahal. Zac is Leahs neighbor with red hair and blue eyes, and her best human friend. Leah is making three wishes every day, genies are doing their best but the results are far from perfect, as genies are very young and unskilled. This is the source of awkward and comic situations, but in the end girls manage to get over all difficulties.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: Rusty Rivets is a fantastic and picturesque animated series about Rusty who lives in Sparkton Hills along with his friend Ruby Ramirez, a robotic tyrannosaurid named Botasaur, and a group of smaller robots known as the Bits. Rusty is a smart inventor and a little genius who with the help of his amazing discoveries helps his friends out of difficulties. Rusty constructs robots of different sizes, forms and purposes, he is in love with science, technology and engineering. Together with his friend Ruby they can repair any old machinery and out-of-date equipment. Their splendid intellect arouses envy and toxic rivals do not play the game clean.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: "Pets Peeved: The notorious Vesuvius Twins have adopted Skipper and King Julien and brought the animals home to their luxury apartment. Not to spoil and pamper - but to fight each other over shiny baubles! The rest of the penguins and lemurs attempt a rescue but are captured themselves and made to perform in a painful "circus" the twins put together. The tables are going to need to be turned to get this circus out of town. Byte-Sized: Kowalski has another breakthrough invention, tiny robots that group together and not only fix broken tools and appliances, but run them as well. The penguins can just sit back and let the "Nanites" take care of all their chores! The problem is, the Nanites are programmed to protect the penguins at all costs, and ultimately seal the birds inside their lair. The only way to escape is to do battle with a giant, nasty, Nanite robot."

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Private has an arch enemy in the form of Dale the snail. Why does this snail hate Private so much? Its because Private allegedly smashed the little guy, and keeps smashing him albeit accidentally. Even a public apology ends with Dale getting crushed. Sadly, Dale should never have been enemies with Private to begin with - it was a different penguin who did him wrong. // King Julien becomes enamored of a giant toilet the penguins have built. He wants to use it as his new throne, only the toilet is actually a stink bomb the penguins built to trap Dr. Blowhole. Julien accidently gets trapped, bound tightly to the bomb, so the penguins must try to stop it from detonating, all while going on a wild truck chase through New York. They end up in a New Jersey dump, and Skipper must show a sensitive side before all is lost.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and "geeks out" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.desc: Robby has trouble adjusting after their familys big move to the rural town of Witwicky, until he and his sister, Mo, discover the first-ever Earthborn Transformers.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: When Cleo and Nefera babysit unruly werewolf triplets, Nefera must accept that she can learn from her younger sister. // Barkimedes includes Buddy in a human-themed game at Monster High, but Buddy realizes the game is entirely wrong about humans.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester decide to trick feuding magicians "Shouty Shirt and Abrakapants" into doing their act one last time. // Diamondo is holding a mystery dinner party, but Best and Bester solve a real mystery that is not part of the game.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best is too anxious to sleep, but Bester knows what to do. He needs to count sheep! Or count one sheep to be exact. // The twins help Flip Flop with her milkshake deliveries, but find one very difficult customer impossible to satisfy.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester go on a mission to find out what gives their favourite cereal "Tenta-Flakes" such a purply taste. // Besters outlandish ideas to make mini golf fun for the customers nearly lead to disaster, but Best saves the day.

programme.title: Harvey Beaks
programme.desc: Welcome to the peck-uliar world of Harvey Beak, a moderately mellow young bird who flies around his magical forest home of Littlebark Grove, with best-bird friends Fee and Foo, a pair of boisterous twins. The three feathered friends are always looking for new things to do, zooming around the forest embarking on adventures. With many other animals living in the forest, theres plenty of new characters and creatures for the trio to meet, often involving them on their mischievous escapades. Harvey lives with his parents, Irving Beaks and Miriam Beaks.

programme.title: Wallykazam!
programme.desc: Dragons love parties, but not baths - and Norville needs one before he can go to Gina Giants party. Can Wally use his magic B words to get Norville in the bath? And can he do it before Bobgoblin gets his hands on their B?

programme.title: Winx Club
programme.desc: Meet Bloom, a girl from Earth, who after she finds out that she is a fairy joins Alfea College on the planet Magix- a magical universe that is inhabited by fairies, witches and other mythical creatures. At Alfea College, fairy warriors from all over the universe study to improve their supernatural powers and here Bloom befriends five other fairies - Stella, the fairy of the Sun, Flora, the fairy of nature, Tecna, the fairy of technology, Musa, the fairy of music and Aisha, the fairy of waves. Together, this group of girls known as the Winx, become best friends and the force to be reckoned with as they experience incredible adventures while defending their universe from varous enemies.

programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. programme.title: Sirds runā akvareļos
programme.desc: Gleznotājs-akvarelists Jānis Brekte strādājis akvareļa, retāk eļļas tehnikā. Viņš bijis viens no populārākajiem un ražīgākajiem sava laika akvarelistiem. Darbības sākuma posmā pievērsies industriālajai ainavai, vēlākajos gados - dabas ainavai: gleznojis ūdeņus, mežus, kalnus, kā arī ziedus un klusās dabas. Sevišķu atzinību ieguvis ar Rīgas un īpaši Vecrīgas gleznojumiem dažādos gadalaikos un noskaņās. Brektes akvareļi izceļas ar izkoptu individuālo rokrakstu, kam raksturīgs brīvs, atraisīts pludinājums, spilgti krāsu akcenti un tieksme konkrētu motīvu pacelt vispārinājuma pakāpē.

programme.title: Gaidām ciemos!
programme.desc: "Gaidām ciemos!" ir par dažādu valstu kultūru, vēsturi un tradīcijām. Raidījuma vadītājs Zurabs Dvaļi ceļo un aicina skatītājus kopā ar viņu pastaigāties pa skaistām vietām, novērtēt apskates vietas, apbrīnot dabu un satikt interesantus cilvēkus. Skatītāji vispirms uzzinās interesantus vēstures faktus par dažādu valstu slavenākajiem vai aizmirstākajiem reģioniem, bet pēc tam izzinās kulinārijas tradīcijas, kopā ar raidījuma viesiem gatavojot vairākus ēdienus.

programme.title: Veselības kompass
programme.desc: Raidījums stāstīs par dažādiem ar veselību saistītiem jautājumiem, sniegs padomus un vedīs tevi ceļā uz veselīgāku dzīvesveidu, labāku pašsajūtu un priecīgāku ikdienu! Katru nedēļu uz sarunu aicināsim dažādus jomas ekspertus un kopā gan sportosim, gan apspriedīsim dažādas ar veselību saistītas tēmas, gan arī izmēģināsim daudz kā jauna un mūsu veselībai noderīga!

programme.title: Zaļā gaisma
programme.desc: Auto, drošība uz ceļa, jaunāko noteikumu un likumu skaidrojumi. Raidījumā pastāstīsim par jaunākajām aktualitātēm, kas jāzina un jāņem vērā katram autovadītājam.

programme.title: Cēsu novads - izcila vieta dzīvei!
programme.desc: Sezonas noslēgumā raidījuma vadītāja Keita Loreta Kronberga izzinās Cēsu novada nākotnes attīstības plānus, sarunājoties ar novada domes priekšsēdētāju Jāni Rozenbergu un viesojosties Cēsu alus darītavā.

programme.title: Zinātne tuvplānā
programme.desc: Informācija ir mūsu laikmeta zelts vai nafta. Sociālo mediju vidē aktuāla ir prasme atpazīt patieso no nepatiesā un ieraudzīt dezinformācijas dažādās sejas. Raidījuma Zinātne tuvplānā 4. sezonas 3. epizodē diskutēsim par to, kāda informācija ir mums visapkārt un kā tajā orientējamies. Kur ir robeža starp informāciju ar neprecizitātēm, pārpratumu, slinkumu iedziļināties vai apzinātu un klaju dezinformāciju? Kādas ir galvenās dezinformācijas tēmas Latvijā? Uz šiem un vēl citiem jautājumiem atbildes rast palīdzēs raidījuma viesi - Vidzemes Augstskolas vadošais pētnieks, profesors Jānis Buholcs un Re:Baltica Re:Check sadaļas vadītāja un redaktore Evita Puriņa. Eksperti pastāstīs arī par to, kā faktu pārbaudes process darbojas un kā lasītāji var zināt, ka faktu pārbaudītājiem ir taisnība. "Zinātne tuvplānā" ir sarunu raidījums par sabiedrībā aktuāliem pētījumiem un tematiem. Deviņu raidījumu ciklu, ko piedāvā Vidzemes Augstskola, vada žurnāliste Sandra Kropa-Kaļužnaja.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Māksla dzīvot
programme.desc: Šonedēļ raidījumā "Māksla dzīvot" tiksimies ar neiroloģi un algoloģi - sāpju ārsti Lindu Zvauni. Skaidrosim, kā atklāt migrēnu, ko darīt ar nepārtrauktām galvassāpēm, un ko ar šo visu iesākt? Rubrikā par zobu veselību, uzzināsim kā uzlabot smaidu ar estētisko zobārstniecību un cik maģiski var uzburt jaunu smaidu, bet acu veselības sadaļā skaidrosim, cik svarīgi laicīgi pamanīt, ka bērns neredz, kā iedrošināt bērnu nebaidīties no brillēm. Bet dejotāja un horegrāfe, deju studijas "Vibe" vadītāja Elza Kronberga dalīsies stāstā kā Jaunzēlande izmainīja viņas dzīvi, kā Elza kļuva par dejotāju un cik ļoti iedvesmojoša dzīve bija Jaunzēlandē. Bet kāpēc Elza atgiezās mājās no zaļās salas, uzzināsiet jaudīgā dvēseles sarunā, kur neizpaliks visgaršīgākās pusdienas Latvijā!

programme.title: Nedēļa Latvijā
programme.desc: Par aizvadītās nedēļas svarīgākajiem notikumiem Latvijas novados.

programme.title: Dzīves ceļojums
programme.desc: Jezuītu tēvs Jānis Meļņikovs ir cilvēks, kurš jau agrā jaunībā sajuta aicinājumu kļūt par priesteri. Viņš absolvējis Rīgas Garīgo semināru un 2007. gadā iesvētīts par katoļu priesteri. Kalpošana draudzē Liepājā un vēlākā pievienošanās jezuītu ordenim, paralēli garīgajai kalpošanai. Jānis Meļņikovs guvis plašu pieredzi akadēmiskajā vidē, šobrīd turpinot studijas arī doktorantūrā. Daudzi viņu atpazīst kā raidījumu "Garīgums mūsdienās" un "Svētdienas doma" veidotāju, kā arī ilggadēju Radio Marija Latvija programmu vadītāju. Raidījumā "Dzīves ceļojums" tēvs Jānis dalīsies pārdomās par ticību, mūsdienu cilvēka meklējumiem un to, kā dzīvē ieraudzīt jēgu ar sirds acīm.

programme.title: Līdakas un Leģendas
programme.desc: Brāļi Klēģeri apvieno spēkus ar Kurzemes puses mutīgo un kolorīto copmani un bitenieku Alex Crazy Fisherman, meklējot Ciecernieka mammas, bet brangākais pārsteigums viņus sagaida vienā no lielākajām Kurzemes upēm - Ventā!

programme.title: Meža stāsti
programme.desc: Ivars Linde - Meža vēstnesis no Zentenes. Vai meža var būt par daudz? Zentenē, 5ha paltībā - Ivars Linde ir veicis īstu transformāciju mežam un sev. Katru dienu viņa soļi ved uz vietu, kur reiz aizmirstā mežā ielokā tagad seljas bērnu stādītie koki. Māte daba sasēja viņa rokas ar darba rīkiem smago tehniku un darbu mūža garumā. Viņš nav cietumā - šī ir viņa brīvība. Šis stāsts, būs par neizmērojamu pieķeršanos dabai, par sirsnību un vīru kura dvēsele ir nolemta koku galotnēs.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Mēs darām tā
programme.desc: Katrs no videostāstiem seko līdzi galveno varoņu dienas gaitām, īpašu vērību pievēršot viņu iestrādātajai zaļā dzīvesstila rutīnai, kas saistīta gan ar saimniekošanu mājās, darbā un dārzā, atkritumu šķirošanu, enerģijas avotu un transporta izvēli, ēšanas paradumiem, darba pienākumu organizēšanu un atpūtu. Tie ļauj ielūkoties, piemēram, šobrīd Rīgā lielākās apkaimes biedrības pārstāvju ikdienā, kuri Grīziņkalnā rūpējas par zaļas un labiekārtotas ārtelpas izveidi, kā arī Pierīgas novadu mājsaimniecībās, vērtējot dažādu apkures veidu efektivitāti un draudzīgumu videi, dažādu mākslinieku saimniekošanas paradumos u.c. Raidījumu vada aktrise un kostīmu māksliniece Madara Botmane, iepazīstinot ar planētai draudzīga dzīvesstila ikdienas paradumiem Latvijas kopienās, komūnās, kolektīvos, apkaimēs un vairāku paaudžu ģimeņu mājvietās.

programme.desc: 09:00 Vidzemē (Vidzemes TV); 09:15 Jēkabpils laiks (Vidusdaugavas TV); 09:30 Skats no Ventspils (Kurzemes TV); 09:45 TV Kurzeme piedāvā.

programme.title: Paititi piezīmes
programme.desc: Ir pienācis laiks no pilsētas pārcelties uz džungļu biezokni. Četri piedzīvojumu meklētāji, Gundars Bojārs, Raitis Kubuliņš, Pēteris Dimants un Aija Andrejeva, kuru uzdevums ir atrast pazudušās pilsētas Paititi pēdas, dodas Manu nacionālā parka virzienā, kas jau izsenis tiek uzskatīts par Paititi iespējamo atrašanās vietu. Kopā ar gidu Hosē, ceļotāji iepazīstas ar plānoto maršrutu un iespējamajiem sarežģījumiem, tajā skaitā - pirmajām naktsmītnēm džungļos, uz kurām lai nokļūtu, nepieciešams šķērsot kalnu upi. Viss jau būtu labi, ja vien tas nenotiktu pilnīgā tumsā un ar aizdomīga un nedroša paskata pārcēlāju.

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Māris Olte tiksies ar LVM vecāko plānotāju, lai runātu par moderno mežu apsaimniekošanu, jeb kā tas izskatās dzīvē. Tāpat apspriedīs kādi izaicinājumi, kādi riski un kādas jaunākās tendences šajā jomā.

programme.title: Veselības kompass
programme.desc: Šonedēļ raidījumā "Veselības kompass" runāsim par veselīgu miegu un tā nozīmi labas veselības uzturēšanā! Kāda ir digitālās higiēnas un viedierīču lietošanas ietekme uz miegu, kāpēc ir svarīgi pievērst uzmanību krākšanai un kā ar to cīnīties, kā arī, kā pūcēm un cīruļiem salāgot ikdienu ar savu iekšējo ritmu? Par šiem jautājumiem runāsim un meklēsim atbildes kopā ar Dr.med Juri Svažu no Miega slimību centra.

programme.title: Rezervēts
programme.desc: Liene Dambiņa. Viņas dzīvi izmainīja notikums - no gultiņas izkrita pašas mazulis. Viņai ir četri bērni, bet patiesībā to ir tūkstošiem. Kad pazūd zeme un jēga ir tikai dzīvībai - viņa ar komandu dara teju visu, lai uzvara būtu. Astoņus miljonus caur ziedotājiem ir atnesusi uz bērnu fondu. Plosa sevi, rakstot ģimenēm - piedodiet, mēs darījām visu, bet… Un jau nākamajā mirklī cīnās par citiem. Paškritiska, noslēgta un tā, kas bēg no pūļiem. Viņai nepatīk uzstāties un runāt par sevi. Politiķi ir flirtējuši un mēģinājuši ievilkt savās rindās. "Kāda jēga no manis sabiedrībai būtu tur?" Iespējams, tad tautai būtu Latvijas prezidente sieviete. Rezervēts - par cilvēcību un līdzcietību - Liene Dambiņa.

programme.title: Māksla dzīvot
programme.desc: Šonedēļ raidījumā "Māksla dzīvot" vieda saruna ar āsti - narkoloģi un biheiviorālās terapijas speciālisti Ilzi Maksimu. Sarunā ne tikai par alkoholismu, bet arī par cēloņiem, risinājumiem un vai ierobežojumi sabiedrībā spēs palīdzēt cilvēkiem ar atkarībām. Redzes veselības rubrikā uzzināsim par miopiju, jeb tuvredzības epidēmiju, bet zobu veselības rubrikā izzināsim nākotnes iespējas un vai zobu varēs izaudzēt? Bet sarunā pie Hercoga pusdienēm diriģents un kora "Balsis" māklsinieciskais vadītājs Ints Teterovskis atklās savu Austrālijas un Jaunzēlandes noslēpumu.

programme.title: Mēs varam - mēs darām!
programme.desc: Televeikala skatlogs. Iedvesmojies kā hobiju pārvērst par pelnītspējīgu biznesu. Uzzini, kas tuvākā un tālākā apkārtnē atjaunots, uzlabots un pilveidots. Seko līdz, stāstiem ar kuriem varam lepoties un iespējām, kas var būt aktuālas tieši Tev!

programme.title: Es daru tā
programme.desc: Katrs no videostāstiem seko līdzi galveno varoņu dienas gaitām, īpašu vērību pievēršot viņu iestrādātajai zaļā dzīvesstila rutīnai, kas saistīta gan ar saimniekošanu mājās, darbā un dārzā, atkritumu šķirošanu, enerģijas avotu un transporta izvēli, ēšanas paradumiem, darba pienākumu organizēšanu un atpūtu. Tie ļauj ielūkoties, piemēram, šobrīd Rīgā lielākās apkaimes biedrības pārstāvju ikdienā, kuri Grīziņkalnā rūpējas par zaļas un labiekārtotas ārtelpas izveidi, kā arī Pierīgas novadu mājsaimniecībās, vērtējot dažādu apkures veidu efektivitāti un draudzīgumu videi, dažādu mākslinieku saimniekošanas paradumos u.c. Raidījumu vada aktrise un kostīmu māksliniece Madara Botmane, iepazīstinot ar planētai draudzīga dzīvesstila ikdienas paradumiem Latvijas kopienās, komūnās, kolektīvos, apkaimēs un vairāku paaudžu ģimeņu mājvietās.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Gaidām ciemos!
programme.desc: "Gaidām ciemos!" ir par dažādu valstu kultūru, vēsturi un tradīcijām. Raidījuma vadītājs Zurabs Dvaļi ceļo un aicina skatītājus kopā ar viņu pastaigāties pa skaistām vietām, novērtēt apskates vietas, apbrīnot dabu un satikt interesantus cilvēkus. Skatītāji vispirms uzzinās interesantus vēstures faktus par dažādu valstu slavenākajiem vai aizmirstākajiem reģioniem, bet pēc tam izzinās kulinārijas tradīcijas, kopā ar raidījuma viesiem gatavojot vairākus ēdienus.

programme.title: Skats no Ventspils. Notikumi. Cilvēki. Viedokļi
programme.desc: Raidījums par notikumiem Ventspilī.

programme.title: Oranžās Indijas Brīvdienas
programme.desc: "Oranžās Brīvdienas" aizvada savas pēdējās dienas Indijā - Diena sākas profesionālā koncertzālē "The Piano Man", kur grupa ieraksta dziesmas video formātā un saglabā īpašos mirkļus. Pēc tam dalībnieki dodas iepazīt Veco Deli ar tā krāsainajiem tirgiem, tempļiem un mākslinieku rajonu, baudot braucienu ar tuk-tuku un pilsētas pulsējošo atmosfēru. Tālāk ceļš ved uz Kolkatu, kur grupa aizvada noslēdzošo koncertu Indijā, bet solists Aleksis cīnās kakla sāpēm. Tomēr spīti tam grupa aizvada enerģijas pilnu un neaizmirstamu vakaru, kur publika dejo un gavilē līdzi. Pēdējā dienā mūziķi dodas pirkt tradicionālos Indiešu tērpos un izbauda saulrietu Hūglijas upē, baudot pilsētas kontrastus un mierīgo noslēgumu pirms ceļa uz Nepālu.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Āzija
programme.desc: Rituālie dziedājumi par godu Ramadāna mēnesim, kas balstīti uz islāma idejām, apvienojumā ar Vidusāzijas tautu tradīciju un kultūras īpatnībām, ir kļuvuši par kaut ko vairāk nekā tikai dziedājumiem. Ko Kirgizstānā mūsdienās nozīmē "Žaramazana"?

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Māris Olte dosies ciemos pie meža saimnieces, kuras zināšanas un darba spējas liek uzmirdzēt meža skaistumam. Raidījums "Meža Veča Emuāri" ciemos pie Lienes, kura atklās ar kādiem izaicinājumiem un risinājumiem darba procesā saskārusies un rezultāts reiz ticis novērtēts ar augstāko atzinību meža nozarē - "Zelta čiekurs".

programme.title: Rezervēts
programme.desc: Kaspars Daugaviņš. Viņš ir kapteinis, kurš neļauj savā vārdā pārdēvēt ielu uz kuras dzīvo. Patriots, kurš jau pusaudžu gados zināja, ka viņam būs Latvijas ģerbonis uz muguras. Puišelis, kurš izlases vecajiem nav ļāvies sevi pazemot. Piepildīja sapni par spēlēšanu NHL, naudu nopelnīja Krievijā, bet mīlestību saņēma Latvijā. Arī tad, kad savu vārdu izlasīja uz kādas sienas - "Daugaviņ, tu esi pim**s*". Ziedojis ķermeni spēlei, kas plosījusi ķermeni, teju zaudējot dzirdi. Viņam nav receptes - kā mīlēt valsti, bet var sākt ar nopļautu zāli un pāris aliņiem. Vajag tikai darīt labu, vispirms citiem un tad sev. To bērnībā tētis iemācīja - "Iemetīsi vārtus, iedošu 50 centus, iedosi piespēli - 1 lats." Bronzas čempionātā viņš juta tēti blakus un cieši. Viņš ir Saule, Pērkons, Daugaviņš. Kaspars Daugaviņš.

programme.title: Personības kods
programme.desc: Rīgas Stradiņa universitātes aciklisko sporta veidu katedras docente Inese Ļubinska. Inese ir cieši pārliecināta, ka tieši kustībā cilvēks saglabā gan fizisko, gan mentālo veselību un dzīvesprieku līdz pat mūža galam.

programme.title: Brīvdienas sākas tagad!
programme.desc: Šajā epizodē Keita viesosies Lubānā un izbaudīs dažādus aktīvās atpūtas veidus dabā. Savukārt Nikija dosies iepazīt, ko piedāvā tūrisma un atpūtas centrs "Ezernieki". Bet satiekoties, oho, meitenes izbaudīs luksusa brīvdienas šarmantā villā Igaunijā! Smelies idejas piedzīvojumiem un košām atmiņām raidījumā "Brīvdienas sākas tagad!".

programme.title: Mans RIFS
programme.desc: No radio dzirdētām skaņām līdz paša smagajam skanējumam. Slaviks mūziku iepazina bērnībā, kad māsa centās ierakstīt kasetes un skatījās raidījumu ZTV- "Ik pa laikam tur sāka skanēt kaut kādi smaguči. Tas man likās tas protests, kas mani pievilināja." Pirmā ģitāra, kas atrasta laukos, pirmās mēģinājumu telpas un draugi, ar kuriem kopā top smagā mūzika. "Bez mūzikas es nevaru sevi iedomāties." viņš saka. Tā ir Slavika pasaule- skaļa, īsta un godīga kā melna kafija bez cukura.

programme.title: Ceļā uz mājām
programme.desc: Artūrs un Anna nesen iegādājušies ģimenes māju, taču tai nepieciešama fasādes krāsas atjaunošana, jo iepriekš izvēlējušies nepareizo toni. programme.title: Mēs darām tā
programme.desc: Katrs no videostāstiem seko līdzi galveno varoņu dienas gaitām, īpašu vērību pievēršot viņu iestrādātajai zaļā dzīvesstila rutīnai, kas saistīta gan ar saimniekošanu mājās, darbā un dārzā, atkritumu šķirošanu, enerģijas avotu un transporta izvēli, ēšanas paradumiem, darba pienākumu organizēšanu un atpūtu. Tie ļauj ielūkoties, piemēram, šobrīd Rīgā lielākās apkaimes biedrības pārstāvju ikdienā, kuri Grīziņkalnā rūpējas par zaļas un labiekārtotas ārtelpas izveidi, kā arī Pierīgas novadu mājsaimniecībās, vērtējot dažādu apkures veidu efektivitāti un draudzīgumu videi, dažādu mākslinieku saimniekošanas paradumos u.c. Raidījumu vada aktrise un kostīmu māksliniece Madara Botmane, iepazīstinot ar planētai draudzīga dzīvesstila ikdienas paradumiem Latvijas kopienās, komūnās, kolektīvos, apkaimēs un vairāku paaudžu ģimeņu mājvietās.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Meža stāsti
programme.desc: Mana daba - Bērnu rendžeri no Cesvaines. Viņi abi ir skolas draugi Cesvainē. Agnis atgreizās no Anglijas, bet Uģis nevarēja izturēt Rīgas mudžekli. Abi apsēdas pils parkā un nolēma vest cilvēkus tur kur paši ir vislaimīgākie - dabā. Viņi ir radījuši izpratni, kustību un piedzīvojumu bērniem visā Latvijā. Daba ir viena mums visiem un viņi ir Cesvaines piedzīvojums tiem, kuri sper pirmso soļus savā Meža Stāstā. Šis raidījums būs par bērnību kura nekad nebeidzas. Par bērnu rendžeriem no Cesvaines.

programme.title: Limbažu novads rada un dara
programme.desc: Par aktualitātēm Limbažu novadā.

programme.title: Līdakas un Leģendas
programme.desc: Brāļi Klēģeri apvieno spēkus ar Kurzemes puses mutīgo un kolorīto copmani un bitenieku Alex Crazy Fisherman, meklējot Ciecernieka mammas, bet brangākais pārsteigums viņus sagaida vienā no lielākajām Kurzemes upēm - Ventā!

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Dzīves ceļojums
programme.desc: Raidījums "Dzīves ceļojums" - stāsti par cilvēku un ticības spēku. Latvijas Pareizticīgo baznīcas diakons Jānis Amoliņš jau bērnībā sajuta Dieva aicinājumu. Pēc pārdomām un garīgiem meklējumiem viņš atradis savu vietu kalpošanā un pieņēmis lēmumu iestāties garīgajā seminārā. Kā šis ceļš mainījis Jāņa dzīvi un ko viņš atklājis ticībā? Sirsnīgs un iedvesmojošs stāsts par jaunu cilvēku, kurš devies savā garīgajā ceļā atklājot Latvijas Pareizticīgo baznīcas tradīcijas.

programme.title: Ceļot bez robežām
programme.desc: Ceļot bez robežām 6.epizode. Lelde un Ivars Cīruļi turpina Ceļot bez robežām.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Ceļā uz mājām
programme.desc: Artūrs un Anna nesen iegādājušies ģimenes māju, taču tai nepieciešama fasādes krāsas atjaunošana, jo iepriekš izvēlējušies nepareizo toni. Lauris Zalāns ar Madaru Kivkucāni ne tikai pieliks roku, lai krāsošanas darbi uz priekšu iet raitāk, bet arī aprunāsies ar krāsu ekspertu, lai noskaidrotu ko ņemt vērā, lai izdodas atrast īsto toni ar pirmo reizi.

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Māris Olte tiksies ar LVM vecāko plānotāju, lai runātu par moderno mežu apsaimniekošanu, jeb kā tas izskatās dzīvē. Tāpat apspriedīs kādi izaicinājumi, kādi riski un kādas jaunākās tendences šajā jomā.

programme.title: Mans RIFS
programme.desc: No radio dzirdētām skaņām līdz paša smagajam skanējumam. Slaviks mūziku iepazina bērnībā, kad māsa centās ierakstīt kasetes un skatījās raidījumu ZTV- "Ik pa laikam tur sāka skanēt kaut kādi smaguči. Tas man likās tas protests, kas mani pievilināja." Pirmā ģitāra, kas atrasta laukos, pirmās mēģinājumu telpas un draugi, ar kuriem kopā top smagā mūzika. "Bez mūzikas es nevaru sevi iedomāties." viņš saka. Tā ir Slavika pasaule- skaļa, īsta un godīga kā melna kafija bez cukura.

programme.title: Skats no Ventspils. Notikumi. Cilvēki. Viedokļi
programme.desc: Raidījums par notikumiem Ventspilī.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Dzīves ceļojums
programme.desc: Jezuītu tēvs Jānis Meļņikovs ir cilvēks, kurš jau agrā jaunībā sajuta aicinājumu kļūt par priesteri. Viņš absolvējis Rīgas Garīgo semināru un 2007. gadā iesvētīts par katoļu priesteri. Kalpošana draudzē Liepājā un vēlākā pievienošanās jezuītu ordenim, paralēli garīgajai kalpošanai. Jānis Meļņikovs guvis plašu pieredzi akadēmiskajā vidē, šobrīd turpinot studijas arī doktorantūrā. Daudzi viņu atpazīst kā raidījumu "Garīgums mūsdienās" un "Svētdienas doma" veidotāju, kā arī ilggadēju Radio Marija Latvija programmu vadītāju. Raidījumā "Dzīves ceļojums" tēvs Jānis dalīsies pārdomās par ticību, mūsdienu cilvēka meklējumiem un to, kā dzīvē ieraudzīt jēgu ar sirds acīm.

programme.title: Māksla dzīvot
programme.desc: Šonedēļ raidījumā "Māksla dzīvot" vieda saruna ar āsti - narkoloģi un biheiviorālās terapijas speciālisti Ilzi Maksimu. Sarunā ne tikai par alkoholismu, bet arī par cēloņiem, risinājumiem un vai ierobežojumi sabiedrībā spēs palīdzēt cilvēkiem ar atkarībām. Redzes veselības rubrikā uzzināsim par miopiju, jeb tuvredzības epidēmiju, bet zobu veselības rubrikā izzināsim nākotnes iespējas un vai zobu varēs izaudzēt? Bet sarunā pie Hercoga pusdienēm diriģents un kora "Balsis" māklsinieciskais vadītājs Ints Teterovskis atklās savu Austrālijas un Jaunzēlandes noslēpumu.

programme.title: Veselības kompass
programme.desc: Šonedēļ raidījumā "Veselības kompass" runāsim par veselīgu miegu un tā nozīmi labas veselības uzturēšanā! Kāda ir digitālās higiēnas un viedierīču lietošanas ietekme uz miegu, kāpēc ir svarīgi pievērst uzmanību krākšanai un kā ar to cīnīties, kā arī, kā pūcēm un cīruļiem salāgot ikdienu ar savu iekšējo ritmu? Par šiem jautājumiem runāsim un meklēsim atbildes kopā ar Dr.med Juri Svažu no Miega slimību centra.

programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: Vācijas futbola Bundeslīga. Menhengladbahas "Borussia" – Minhenes "Bayern"
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: A sērija. "Napoli" – Milānas "Inter"
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: Francijas futbola 1. līga. "Stade Brestois 29" – Parīzes "Saint-Germain"
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

programme.title: Anglijas Futbola čempionāts. "Ipswich Town FC" – "West Bromwich Albion FC"
programme.desc: The English Football League Championship or the "EFL" as it is otherwise referred to, is the stepping stone from the wilderness of English football, to the riches associated with the promised land, that is the English Premier League. In keeping with traditions of this club championship, we bring you first-hand, live coverage of developments for this division. Touted as one of the hardest leagues to manoeuvre out of, it was founded in 2004 and has truly delivered with its play-off system, offering a whole new dimension of entertainment, compared to other leagues out there. From "Sleeping Giants" such as Nottingham Forest and Sheffield Wednesday, to the jostling pack of Preston and Brentford, marquee match-ups every week will decide the final Championship standings, come the end of May.

programme.title: LaLiga. "Valencia" – "Villarreal CF"
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

programme.title: Football: LaLiga

It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Anglijas Futbola čempionāts. "Ipswich Town FC" – "West Bromwich Albion FC"
programme.desc: The English Football League Championship or the "EFL" as it is otherwise referred to, is the stepping stone from the wilderness of English football, to the riches associated with the promised land, that is the English Premier League. In keeping with traditions of this club championship, we bring you first-hand, live coverage of developments for this division. Touted as one of the hardest leagues to manoeuvre out of, it was founded in 2004 and has truly delivered with its play-off system, offering a whole new dimension of entertainment, compared to other leagues out there. From "Sleeping Giants" such as Nottingham Forest and Sheffield Wednesday, to the jostling pack of Preston and Brentford, marquee match-ups every week will decide the final Championship standings, come the end of May.

programme.title: Vācijas futbola Bundeslīga. Menhengladbahas "Borussia" – Minhenes "Bayern"
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Восточные сладости
programme.desc: Таня и Игорь мечтают стать счастливыми родителями, но пока все их попытки оказываются тщетными. Последней надеждой супругов становится клиника репродуктивной медицины в Стамбуле, которая работает по новейшим американским технологиям. В Турции пара попадает на прием к известному репродуктологу Кемалю. А уже спустя две недели Таня узнает о своей беременности, которая теперь ее совсем не радует - она понимает, что отцом будущего ребенка может быть вовсе не ее муж…

А уже спустя две недели Таня узнает о своей беременности, которая теперь ее совсем не радует - она понимает, что отцом будущего ребенка может быть вовсе не ее муж…

programme.title: Исчезновение
programme.desc: Катя и Сергей – счастливая семейная пара. У них совместный бизнес, джип последней модели, квартира в современном доме в центре города. Всё настолько хорошо и благополучно, что супруги уже подумывают о загородном трёхэтажном коттедже с бассейном. Но однажды всё меняется – Сергей бесследно исчезает. Катя обращается в милицию - безрезультатно. Тогда Катя начинает собственное расследование. В этом ей помогает подруга Мила. Обойдя всех знакомых и незнакомых, женщины выясняют, что у Сергея есть вторая семья…

programme.title: Год Золотой рыбки
programme.desc: Три заветных желания, написанные на бумажечках подругами, взялась исполнить певица Лада Рыбка. У нее всё складывается отлично: гастроли, запись на телевидении, любовь. Перед свадьбой с Вадимом Лада собирает одноклассниц на "девичник". Барышни судачат о жизни, и Лада убеждает учительницу Асю, милиционершу Машу и бизнес-леди Нину, что в жизни возможно всё, надо просто чётко знать, что же тебе нужно! Подруги пишут на листочках желания, а Лада обещает, что они обязательно исполнятся! Только вот судьба распоряжается по-иному.
